description.en: Gather 5 pieces and the Pet Tamer will give you a Scroll of Pet Revival (A Class).
description.ar: Gather 5 pieces and the Pet Tamer will give you a Scroll of Pet Revival (A Class).
description.br: Reúna 5 pedaços e o Domador lhe dará um Pergaminho de Reviver Pet (Classe A).
description.cns: 宠物复活卷轴(A)的碎片,搜集到一定个数后 拿给宠物召唤兽的话,就可以换到宠物复活卷轴(A)
description.de: Sammle 3 Teile und tausche sie beim Pet Tamer gegen 1 Scroll of Pet Recovery (A).
description.fi: Gather 5 pieces and the Pet Tamer will give you a Scroll of Pet Revival (A Class).
description.fil: Gather 5 pieces and the Pet Tamer will give you a Scroll of Pet Revival (A Class).
description.fr: Rassemblez 5 morceaux et amenez les à l'éleveur de familiers. Il vous les échangera contre un Parchemin de Rappel à la vie pour familier (A).
description.id: Kumpulkan 5 buah dan Pet Tamer akan memberi Anda Scroll of Pet Revival (A Class).
description.it: Gather 5 pieces and the Pet Tamer will give you a Scroll of Pet Revival (A Class).
description.jp: 3枚集めてペットテイマーに持っていくと、ペット復活の巻物(A)と交換してくれます。
description.kr: 리어펫 부활의 두루마리(A)의 조각. 일정 개수를 모아 펫테이머에게 가져가면 리어펫 부활의 두루마리(A)로 교환하여 준다.
description.nl: Gather 5 pieces and the Pet Tamer will give you a Scroll of Pet Revival (A Class).
description.pl: Gather 5 pieces and the Pet Tamer will give you a Scroll of Pet Revival (A Class).
description.ru: Укротитель обменяет 3 таких клочка на целый свиток воскрешения питомца IV уровня.
description.sp: Reúne 5 trozos y el Domador de Mascotas te dará un Pergamino de Resurrección de Mascotas (Clase A).
description.sw: Gather 5 pieces and the Pet Tamer will give you a Scroll of Pet Revival (A Class).
description.th: รวบรวม 5 ชิ้นและ Pet Tamer จะให้ Scroll of Pet Revival (คลาส A) แก่คุณ
description.tw: 召喚獸復活卷軸(A)的碎片，蒐集到5個後，拿給召喚獸訓練師的話，就可以換到召喚獸復活卷軸(A)
description.vi: Thu thập 5 mảnh và Pet Tamer sẽ cung cấp cho bạn một cuộn Pet Revival (A Class).
